text: Wonderful experience having scaling and polishing done by Dr Jasper Tan. Felt no pain at all throughout the whole procedure, very gentle and comfortable experience. He also explained my oral health to me clearly giving great tips to how i can improve my routine. Will definitely visit him again !

Took a few weeks to get an appointment (long line!), but the process itself was smooth and the proceedings at the clinic were efficient. Dr Lynette was very experienced, and my teeth have turned out nice and white and as even as can be hoped for with my fluorosis, with minimal discomfort during and after the Zoom whitening. The staff at the clinic were also friendly and helpful with after care instructions. Thank you for looking after me!

The clinic is easy to locate, ambience is very nicr and calm. There ate coffee and tea provided for us too. The staff at this clinic is very friendly and kind. Dr Joel Huang is a very patient and kind dentist. He did his best to keep pain and sensitivity to a minimum level. After scaling and polishing he very patiently addressed all of my queries and is very knowledgable. I would recommend this place to all of my friends! Thank you! :)

I made a visit to the dental studio, was welcomed by friendly reception staff. Had zoom whitening by Dr Jasper Tan and the whole process was smooth. Dr explained the process well, and what to take note after the process too. He was also gentle in cleaning the teeth. Overall great experience with Dr Jasper Tan and would highly recommend him!

Dr Woo did my braces for me a few months back and I'm extremely happy with the progress so far! She was detailed in explaining the whole process and patiently addressed my concerns, helping me feel reassured throughout. She's also highly experienced and skilled, and I highly recommend her for anyone seeking to do braces. Front desk staff Kaelyn is jovial and goes the extra mile to ensure a seamless experience. Thank you The Dental Studio for the quality and efficient service as always!
